attributes.action: The Last Days Of The Raj Racism & Ill-Feeling Against Sikhs in Documentary
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
On 12th 
>March 2007 at 9pm, Channel 4 aired the programme 
"Partition". The programme was totally biased, misrepresentative of 
the Sikh perspective, which was very offensive, and many Sikhs feel 
invoked racism against Sikhs.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
